title: How Does Jumbo-Visma Square Wout van Aert’s Giro d’Italia Dream with Its Tour de France Defense?
content:
Can Jumbo-Visma keep Van Aert happy without torpedoing its chances at the Tour? Or does it have to reign in the Belgian's bold new ambition?

Read the full article at How Does Jumbo-Visma Square Wout van Aert’s Giro d’Italia Dream with Its Tour de France Defense? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
